line.comment: * Returns the (new) leader of the formation.
* If $squadron is a homebase, we create a new squadron; otherwise we join the existing one if a leader exists, or we create a new squadron.
* Look for a possible new leader and join if any. Note that $squadron is a station when we specifically want a new squadron to be created.
* Support ships are not added as followers.
* Note: a support can return to a follower (see Mayhem.Task.Support), but a follower cannot become a support again (even though the potential code is in !move.follow.template -> CheckDock:).
* Starts with retreat mode activated to stay still and reinforce from Mayhem.Monitor.Autopopulate.Ship.

sval.val: Returns the (new) leader of the formation.
If $squadron is a homebase, we create a new squadron; otherwise we join the existing one if a leader exists, or we create a new squadron.
Look for a possible new leader and join if any. Note that $squadron is a station when we specifically want a new squadron to be created.
Support ships are not added as followers.
Note: a support can return to a follower (see Mayhem.Task.Support), but a follower cannot become a support again (even though the potential code is in !move.follow.template -> CheckDock:).
Starts with retreat mode activated to stay still and reinforce from Mayhem.Monitor.Autopopulate.Ship.
